a.n: The Amazing World of Gumball III

p.k: The Law / The Allergy / The Mothers / The Password / The Procrastinators / The Shell / The Mirror / The Burden Gumball jaywalks and is pulled over by Donut Cop. / Darwin starts sneezing repeatedly and it seems he can't stop. / It's Mother's Day and Gumball and Darwin discover that Tobias and Banana Joe have both made a card for The Best Mum in the World. / Mum has forced Dad to install a password on the computer… / Gumball and Darwin are offended when Mom calls them “procrastinators” once she’s told them what it means. / While performing a school play Gumball is so nervous about kissing Penny that he accidentally head-butts her and cracks open her shell. / Gumball receives a scare-email from a freaky ghost and decides to ignore it despite Darwin's advice. / Vice Principal Brown gives Gumball and Darwin the ancient school hamster Chris Morris to look after for the weekend.
